record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H. CON. RES. 362
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H. CON. RES. 362 -- (House of Representatives - July 22, 2008)

[Page: H6796]

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: ALLEN
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that my name be removed as a cosponsor of H. Con. Res. 362.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Maine?
